newsitem.title: UK: Burford to buy Trocadero properties.
newsitem.headline: Burford to buy Trocadero properties.

text.p: British property investment group Burford Holdings Plc said on Wednesday it was buying the freehold interests in the Trocadero properties for up to 210 million stg.
Burford said 160 million stg was payable upon completion to Trocadero Plc and the remainder of the purchase price was deferred over an expected 24 months.

"The proposed acquisition of the Trocadero and London Pavilion properties represents a rare opportunity to acquire an attractive retail and leisure investment of substantial lot size in London's West End market," said Nigel Wray, chairman of Burford.
Trocadero Plc said in a separate statement that it will have a cash surplus of up to 73 million stg on the sale, which it will use to develop its leisure and media activities.
